title: Gameplay Kills were not awarded in summoner draft
body:
My caitlyn first bloods rengar botlane, but when she gets a double kill when we sweep 3 botlane she gets 2 assists instead. 
Here's the misery: http://matchhistory.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/#match-details/NA1/1553408824/32310574/eog

replies.body: She killed him when he was going in brush, I think it's a vision bug. Sorry for getting back to this so late, the people I played with in this game doxxed me on tumblr. It's been stressful.
You are making this hard for me, I need way more information than this to investigate what you are reporting. Is this repeatable, or a one time occurrence?
